divs: sighting detailsi am 43 this happened when i was about 7. my family were going cross country and the event happened at night. my dad had a plymouth and i was in the back seat in the middle. it was night and the way the car winshield was i was able to lean my head back and look up at the sky. it was night and i could see the stars in the sky . as i looked up i saw a octagon shape street sign looking ufo in the sky. at the time i didnt know what a ufo was but thought that the shape was different and wondered what it was. it had no lights and was black i saw no light on it at all and it was spinning very slow. i could see the shape because the sky in the back was brighter than the object above our car. then as i looked another one came up behinde it and connected to it. \ now let me tell you this before zi go on. this incident has bothered mem my whole life and i told only my children wife and mom a few weeks ago. i also tried to contact seti for info about a stop sighn looking ufo that had no lights and they blew me off along with others. monday i happened to be channel surfing and came across a ufo show. i thought more crapabotu glowing ufo's. i thought what about the one i saw then you had a segment that was exactly!!!!!!!!! what i saw. though i didnt see like a separation of pie lights on the bottom. now this is where my proof comes in. i still have the email i sent out on my computer and can fax you a copy proving that this is what i saw. i would like to know if others not only saw a octagon shape looking ufo but saw two that connected in the sky. please contact me. since i was a kid i dont know what city i was in when we took the trip. i do know that there wernt many trees. i was like a desert long strip of highway.
